https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/siTkLQ7KZXEURRsX92Uc54EaET3.jpg Shannon and Kris embark on a cross country road trip, to put back the pieces of their strained friendship. But it all falls apart when their car breaks down in Kain, Arizona. A place where you can check in anytime you want, but you can never leave. Badlands of Kain
